ARTICLE.TITLE: Seven new Covid-19 cases confirmed in Latvia
ARTICLE.TEXT:
RIGA, Aug 15 (LETA) - Of the 1,881 Covid-19 tests carried out in Latvia in the past 24 hours, seven have come back positive, according to the data released today by the Center for Disease Prevention and Control (CDC).

Four of the new cases are contacts of persons already infected with the virus, two have recently returned from abroad (Italy and France), while it is still being determined how the final person was infected with the virus.

To date, a total of 224,412 Covid-19 tests have been carried out in Latvia and 1,315 people have tested positive. The virus has killed 32 people and 1,078 people have recovered from Covid-19.

According to the National Health Service's data, one new Covid-19 patient has been hospitalized in the past 24 hours. All four Covid-19 patients currently being treated in hospital have symptoms of moderate severity. Altogether, 198 hospitalized patients have recovered from the virus.
